tool_description:
Free API to convert coordinates (latitude, longitude) to and from address 
An Easy, Open, Worldwide, Free Geocoding API
title: Address From To Latitude Longitude

api_list.name: Address to Coordinates  (latitude longitude)
api_list.description: By using this geographic tool you can get the lat long coordinates from an address. Please type the address which would include the name of the city/town, state and street name to get more accurate lat long value. Also, the gps coordinates of the address will be calculated below.

api_list.name: Coordinates  (latitude longitude) to Address
api_list.description: By using this geographic tool you can get the lat long coordinates from an address. Please type the address which would include the name of the city/town, state and street name to get more accurate lat long value. Also, the gps coordinates of the address will be calculated below.
